phrases: So, it is going pretty well with your girlfriend?
I am thinking of proposing to her
once this business deal goes through.
Well, that is a reason to celebrate.
I am Going to Marry Her Once I Leave This School
I do not think it was just a normal accident.
But Hatagaya Academy has classes from
kindergarten all the way to college.
I will not be able to find him that easi
Nice to meet all of you.
She stood up and then sat right back down...
So where should we have our Souta-chan sit?
There is an open seat right there.
There is no doubt about it.
That weird guy from this morning.
If you need something, just let me know.
Also if you want to know about any of the girls, I have got your back.
All the ladies like me, so I do not think I will be needing your help.
I will let you be my servant.
Two sadists will not get along!
Want to join us in our quest to become the number one high school baseball team?
You shall give me a moment of your time.
You see, I cannot stand not solving any mystery that catches my eye.
Now you shall tell me everything!
I can see it glistening in front of me.
You keep looking above people's heads
right hereand then making some sort of decision based on that, are not you?!
Wh-What are you going on about?
I can tell you keep worrying about
I know you have not forgotten.
I know that is why all of that happened.
I do not know what it was, but I am certain you did something.
You see something, do not you?!
So you were at that intersection...
Do not try to fool me with that rubbish!
Now tell me what you did.
I instinctively know what I have to do to destroy those flags,
That business deal is never going to go through.
I destroyed the death flag that was waving above his head.
So did you do the same thing in the classroom, then?
With that guy who was talking about helping you with girls...
And that girl who was coming on to you?
Give those bad gags of yours a rest.
but why destroy those friendship and romance flags?
Are you trying to be a hero, who does not use his powers for his own good?
Everything you said was just a bad joke, correct?
I do not mind if you laugh at me.
I did not tell you because I wanted you to believe me.
Misfortune comes to people who get too close to me.
see people get hurt any longer.
do not involve yourself with me anymore.
It should not matter to you if I am a loner or not.
Do not talk about being alone so trivially!
In the end, you are just rejecting anyone who approaches you.
Have you heard about the Premium Ambriel disaster?
The luxury liner that sank the other day?
All of the passengers are missing, except one.
Only a single person was rescued.
The truth behind the Premium Ambriel
I am trying to tell you
I have had enough of those eyes of yours.
I have had enough of your obsession with your own misfortune.
I have had enough of you making me remember things I do not want to remember.
Misfortune comes to people who get too close to you?
Enough of your talk about being alone.
Is there a flag above my head, like the ones you have mentioned?
Of course there is not anything.
I do not feel any love or friendship towards you in the slightest.
And as such, I should not have any of those flags of yours.
Even I did, that overly self-defeating
attitude of yours would destroy it in an instant.
If I do not like something about you, I am going to tell you,
and when I want to yell at you, I am going to yell.
You should just do the same to me.
Just stop looking so depressed in front of me...
I hate being called by my last name.
You add -san or -chan, and you are dead.
It is the first time a boy's said my name without an honorific!
Could I eat lunch with you?
You broke her flag, did not you?
I will not bug you at all, so we can eat together, right?
You did not break her flag?
No, I really do not think so.
Well, I will just start eating until you really think I need to go.
I do not know if I want to eat with a girl...
Then I will just wait until you finish eating, Souta-kun!
You have not heard of the Mahougasawa Group?
She is the heir to the owner of the whole group.
So one of those super-rich girls, then.
She is the 13th princess of the Principality of Bladefield.
but I am the princess of a small backwater country in Europe.
14 princesses in a small castle, so we do not really get along.
That is why I got sent to this island nation in the first place.
so it is strange I am studying overseas here.
Sorry, I do not have any money...
I do not need your money!
There is something more important than money.
It is our friendship, sparkling like a gem.
From today forth, the three of us will
be bound by friendship, a bond strong than diamond.
All you did is eat your lunch!
Well, she does not brag about being part of the famous Mahougasawa Group,
she is got this kind, lovable atmosphere about her,
and is always surrounded by friends.
she has everything you do not.
I do not know if that has anything to do with those flags you speak of.
Why is someone like that trying to get close to me?
Let us all go home together.
Why are you trying to get close to me?
Well, I could not just leave a dog sitting there getting pelted by rain
or a cat pitiably crying out for help...
You are basically being charitable to all of the dogs and cats out there
since you have so much money.
I feel like you are screaming out for help more than any cat or dog!
Well, given how gloom and doom you are,
you need a friend like this.
Souta-kun, you will be my friend, will not you?!
can I go to your house, like friends do?!
My house is a complete mess.
I am a neat-freak, although I may not look it.
It is okay for me to like you?!
Why are you bringing me along?
So where is this Quest Dorm place, anyway?
The station after the Hatsudai school station.
The next station over is 10 kilometers away, right?
I know the place is large,
but I never would have thought this was part of the school.
I told you two it was a mess.
It is so dangerous, the sign's crooked.
It is so dangerous, there are holes in the stairway.
The holes are what make it dangerous.
I would not be surprised if the
floor on the second level collapsed at any time.
It does not look much better in here.
I do not have anywhere else to go.
I am just happy I have a place to stay.
It is the first time I have been to a friend's house
and been in a guy's room!
You have lots of friends, do not you?
I have wanted to be your friend for a while now, too!
Well, I could not just leave a dog sitting there getting pelted by rain
or a cat pitiably crying out for help...
So I am basically a pet, too?!
It is nice to see you laugh, Souta-kun!
I want you to laugh forever.
I-I am going to hit the restroom.
I wanted to see him laugh some more.
So what do you like so much about Souta, Akane?
I cannot stand not solving any
The first time I saw Souta-kun,
it felt like someone grabbed my heart.
I wanted to do something for him.
This story's from when I was a kid.
Since I was the granddaughter of the head of the Mahougasawa Group,
I did not really have any friends.
They sent me to a library to expand my knowledge,
and that was the first time I met a friend my age, who felt like an equal.
So exchanging the things we cared about was just something
we did to show our feelings for each other.
the things we shared had very different values.
and a wall went up that
pitiable and looked down on her.
I could not save that pitiable girl.
And so I ran into Souta-kun,
and thought to myself, I can save someone this time,
and if I could pull that off, then I could, in turn,
somehow make up for being pitiable myself so long ago.
That is why these selfish desires of mine are not love.
I cannot let them be love.
I do not really see a problem.
You two are alike in a way.
That people would meet misfortune if they got too close to him, or something.
What caused you two to think like that may have been different,
but if you both are not trying to make yourselves happy,
and are trying to make each other happy instead,
end up happy in the end.
I left something in Souta-kun's room.
I am going to go get it.
Make sure you do not fall.
A death flag just appeared above Akane's head.
I did not see anything that would bring this on...
Do you have any idea what could cause this?
What did you talk to Akane about?!
When you talk about the past,
it creates death flags that are far worse than normal ones.
What do I need to destroy this flag?
I will call an ambulance right now.
hate me so much I fell down here?
I am sure she wanted to be friends with you again.
I am sure you are keeping that safe until you can see her again.
You are going to see her again, and become friends with her again.
This happened to you because you were not keeping it safe.
just like you did for me.
I want you to surround yourself
and do the same for all of them.
I will do that once you recover from this.
If I cannot shatter that one, I will just make another stand in its place!
A flag of life that will overpower the other one.
Do not hate me for this, Akane.
but I am sure the next episode will have me back to living my old, peaceful life.
Yeah, but you just had that flag appear.
Speaking of which, is there anyone else
living in the Quest Dorm with you?
Who else besides me would choose to live there?
We will be taking one more flag.
It will be just like this next time.
But I cannot say it yet.
